displayName: Restrict access to Entra admin center
description: Access to the Microsoft Entra admin center should be restricted to authorized administrators only.
rationale: Limiting access to the admin center reduces the risk of unauthorized changes and exposure of sensitive configuration.
impact: Only authorized administrators will be able to access the Entra admin center.

remediation.text:
To remediate using the UI:
1. Navigate to Microsoft Entra admin center https://entra.microsoft.com/.
2. Go to Roles and administrators.
3. Assign admin roles only to trusted users.
4. Use Conditional Access policies to restrict access to the admin center.

status.message: Access to Entra admin center is not restricted.

notes: This control is equivalent to 5.1.2.4 in CIS 5.0.0.
